articles.title: Japan princess to wed, reject payout after controversy: reports - NEWS.com.au
articles.description: The course of true love never did run smooth, but after public controversy and a wedding delay, Japan's Princess Mako is reportedly set to tie the knot and move to America.
articles.content: Japan's Princess Mako will lose her royal title when she marries her commoner sweetheartThe course of true love never did run smooth, but after public controversy and a wedding delay, Japan's Princes… [+558 chars]

articles.title: Doubling the number of species of hand-standing spotted skunks - Phys.org
articles.description: Picture a skunk. You're probably thinking of a stocky animal, around the size of a housecat, black with white stripes, like Pepé Le Pew. That describes North America's most common skunk, the striped skunk, but they also have smaller, spotted cousins. Scientis…

articles.title: Former child actor Matthew Mindler died by suicide at 19 - The Star Online
articles.description: Mindler had numerous acting credits to his name including in productions like 'As The World Turns', 'Chad: An American Body', and 'Our Idiot Brother'.
articles.content:
Days after his body was found near his college campus in Pennsylvania, United States, the cause of death for former child actor Matthew Mindler has been determined to be suicide.
